en: "I am from Eritrea. I have been in Germany since 2015. Although I am afraid, I am participating today in the demonstration against Pegida. I don't understand why they are against me. I am Christian, but religion is a private thing. Life is for everyone. Why can't everyone live how he or she wants? Why doesn't Pegida care about everyone doing well? The name is against Islam, but it's always against foreigners. Why? People from Pegida think foreigners like me are Muslims. In Germany, there are laws that say that no one can be discriminated against on the basis of their religion or their skin color. Pegida isn't interested in these laws. I think they come from another planet."
